Dharma.description: Action aligned with your values and purpose.
Dharma.reflectionPrompt: Am I acting in alignment with my core values?
Dharma.microPractice: Write down the top 3 outcomes that reflect your purpose.
Dharma.breathingPrompt: Take 3 deep breaths focusing on intention.

Vairagya.description: Detachment from results; focus on process, not outcome.
Vairagya.reflectionPrompt: Am I clinging to results or expectations?
Vairagya.microPractice: List what you can release control over today.
Vairagya.breathingPrompt: Inhale for 4, hold for 2, exhale for 6.

Abhyasa.description: Discipline and consistent practice to build skill.
Abhyasa.reflectionPrompt: Am I consistently practicing my chosen habit?
Abhyasa.microPractice: Commit to 10 minutes of focused practice now.
Abhyasa.breathingPrompt: Box breathing: inhale 4, hold 4, exhale 4, hold 4.
